articles.title: Anthony Pileggi
articles.contents:
Stochastic Squirrel LLC
          
          
          Home
          LLC
          Shiny Apps
          R Packages
          CV
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Anthony Pileggi
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            I have been the first/only data scientist at two ecommerce companies, and shaped the foundations of how they approach and utilize their data.
            I work with company leaders to drive revenue, optimize profits, and improve productivity through data-driven strategy, tools, and analyses.
            I am a skilled coder and determined problem-solver with a strong background in advanced statistical concepts.
            I have devised strategies, built tools, and implemented procedures that have saved thousands of hours in labor and generated millions of dollars in additional revenue.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Anthony Pileggi
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      GitHub
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      Email
                    
                  
                                  
              
            
            
              I have been the first/only data scientist at two ecommerce companies, and shaped the foundations of how they approach and utilize their data.
              I work with company leaders to drive revenue, optimize profits, and improve productivity through data-driven strategy, tools, and analyses.
              I am a skilled coder and determined problem-solver with a strong background in advanced statistical concepts.
              I have devised strategies, built tools, and implemented procedures that have saved thousands of hours in labor and generated millions of dollars in additional revenue.

articles.title: R Packages
articles.contents:
CRAN
casino - Play Poker, Blackjack, or Slots in the R console
worrrd - Generate wordsearch and crossword puzzles
GitHub
skuvaultr - Interact with the SkuVault API (inventory management software)
channeladvisor - Interact with the ChannelAdvisor API (multi-channel commerce platform)
shipstationr - Interact with the ShipStation API (shipping software)
